summary: This is an email correspondence dated August 8, 2019, regarding the scheduled transfer of prisoners from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York to a GEO Group facility. The transfer is scheduled for August 9, 2019, and includes instructions to provide 7 days of medication with the medical summary.

events.title: Scheduled Prisoner Transfer
events.description: Planned transfer of prisoners from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York to a GEO Group facility, with instructions to include 7 days of medication.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 8, 2019, scheduling a prisoner transfer for the following day.
The transfer is from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York to a GEO Group facility.
Instructions specify that 7 days of medication should be included with the medical summary for the transfer.
